page.title: 13JAMES"PARAFFIN"YOUNG
page.content: 'Paraffin'Young was the first regular oil man.He was born early in the 19th Century in Glasgow.He became famous as the first man to refine oil from coal.He is the real pioneer of todays oil business. At one time he lived in Limefield House in Polbeth and was very good friends with David Livingstone,whom he financed often in his work.When countries were gasping for new fuels he came up with the solution,paraffin,that is how he got his name.He bought new lamps and tested it,soon everyone had lights in their homes.He kept hard at his business and moved to West calder to refine oil out of shale,it was a success and the population grew as people came for jobs.This was when the 5 sisters were made from excess shale.When he died he was buried in Inverkip near Greenock,Scotland.
